title: Discovering You
description: When Lucy Howard goes to Daleford Manor to work for the mysterious and secretive Nicholas Davenport, an instant attraction flares to life between them. But when his past merges with his present, danger threatens to tear them apart. Desperate to keep her with him, Nicholas makes a decision that will change both their livesâ€”and ultimately make the love they've discovered burn brighter than ever.
author: Melissa  Kean
